value.title: Ever wanted a NOTIFICATION in your Power BI Reports?
value.excerpt: Maybe you want your Power BI report users to get be notified of some changes that occurred. And, you want that displayed within the report. Patrick has a way you can do just that!  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next

value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Want to explore locations with data? The Visio visual in Power BI helps you do just that! Patrick looks at how to set it up and help use your data to highlight areas within a Visio diagram.  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/visiosample  Documentation: https://support.microsoft.com/office/add-visio-visuals-to-power-bi-reports-4f09be62-f436-45c2-93b0-4a0f66b1f5a7

value.excerpt: Not sure where to begin with Azure Synapse Analytics? Patrick gets you started and teaches you the clicks to get up and running quickly!   Get Started with Azure Synapse Analytics https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/get-started  Learn how you can become an Azure Synapse Influencer: http://aka.ms/synapseinfluencers

Create and use the paginated report visual https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/paginated-report-visual

value.title: Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium
value.excerpt: In this video, Christian Wade joined Adam Saxton to discuss Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium. You can use Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium to take your dataset beyond 1GB and avoid failures such as timeouts.  Incremental Refresh with Power BI Premium documentation - https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-premium-incremental-refresh

Chris also looks at how change the behavior to make things a bit faster.  Data Privacy Blog: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2018/12/27/data-privacy-settings-data-refresh-performance-power-bi-excel/

value.title: Parameters and Templates with Power BI Desktop

value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release. value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data. value.title: Tools to take Power BI to the NEXT LEVEL
value.excerpt: We've mentioned them multiple times but now to bring them all together. These are the TOOLS you need to take Power BI to the NEXT LEVEL! Tools we use every day!  Performance Analyzer: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/create-reports/desktop-performance-analyzer  External tools in Power BI Desktop https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/desktop-external-tools

value.title: Tracing with Log Analytics and Power BI
value.excerpt: With Log Analytics integration in Power BI, you can now capture Analysis Services trace events easily and over a longer period of time. Combined with the Power BI template report, you can gain a lot of insights into usage of your datasets. With more to come down the road!  Announcing long-term usage
